content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Maryam Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would be 1,300 Euro per month, reflecting the market value and investment in the property, as well as its premium features and central location.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As Peter Schmidt, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome of the negotiation at 7 out of 10. While I believe the apartment is worth more, the student's offer demonstrates a willingness to compromise, and further negotiations could potentially reach a mutually agreeable price.
name: Peter Schmidt
